plot: An artist falls for a society girl, only to be shot by her jealous suitor. The artist's sweetheart intervenes and saves his life.
title: The Artist's Wife
plot_es: An artist falls for a society girl, only to be shot by her jealous suitor. The artist's sweetheart intervenes and saves his life.
plot_en: An artist falls for a society girl, only to be shot by her jealous suitor. The artist's sweetheart intervenes and saves his life.
